SELECT A.GRPID , A.GRP_NM , A.REG_DT , COUNT(B.USERID) AS EXPRT_CNT , USE_YN FROM TB_SPB_JDGS_GRP A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SPB_JDGS_GRP_MAPNG B ON A.GRPID = B.GRPID WHERE 1=1
AND A.GRP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchKeyword},'%')
GROUP BY A.GRPID
SELECT GRPID , GRP_NM , REG_DT , USE_YN FROM TB_SPB_JDGS_GRP WHERE GRPID = #{grpId}

SELECT C.USERID ,C.ACNT ,C.NM ,C.EML ,C.MOBLPHON ,C.REG_DT ,C.MDFCN_DT FROM TB_SPB_JDGS_GRP A INNER JOIN TB_SPB_JDGS_GRP_MAPNG B ON A.GRPID = B.GRPID INNER JOIN TB_CMM_USER C ON C.USERID = B.USERID WHERE A.GRPID = #{grpId}
